name: Ghost Racing VR
description:
This is a mobile VR game to be played on android devices which have a gyroscope sensor. You will compete against your Ghost Car around a meticulous fast paced circuit for a number of laps.

The game has controller support for a racing simulator feel and ease of maneuverability. 

Minimum Requirements

  • 2 GB RAM
  • Decent GPU
  • Gyroscope Support (Must for VR experience)
  • Bluetooth Controller, or Xbox One Controller(and Higher), or PS4 Controller(and higher)
  • VR Headset (Google Cardboard)
